page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content: The schools involved in this survey were: The Stoke High School. Although the school building is just outside the area, its catchment area is covered by this D block. Chantry Junior School. Its pupils live within the D block, but buildings are just outside the area. The following schools are within the D block and also contributed: Downing C.P. School; Halifax C.P. School; Hillside C.P. School and Sprites Junior School. Staff involved were: From Stoke High Peter Payn,editor, Stephanie Heenan; from Sprites Junior, Tom Veasey; from Chantry Junior, Len Dines. Thanks also to Sally Harris, Hillside C.P., Terry Kenny, Downing C.P., David Loades and Maynard Dunlop, Halifax C.P.
